column3: Has been this way since introduction: 01e06d1fa365cedb7f5d5e17e6bdf0b526e700c5 /cc @morcos \nThe very similar method `MarkConflicted` has been implemented this way since introduction. 9ac63d6d30

Without this change, test line 133 fails, because re-sending the 1st child automatically re-activates the 2nd child, because it has never been marked abandoned:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13652/files#diff-065f504c44f2c3fc4eebe8287af0ed6eR133

test output before:

```
$ python3 test/functional/wallet_abandonconflict.py 
2018-07-12T21:47:02.018000Z TestFramework (INFO): In
Nice catch.  That does look like a long standing bug.\nConcept ACK.
utACK 89e70f9d7fe384ef9de4fa3828d4c80523290186, thanks for adding better tests too
utACK 89e70f9d7fe384ef9de4fa3828d4c80523290186\n\nChecked that the test in 89e70f9d7fe384ef9de4fa3828d4c80523290186 fails without compiling the bitcoind
